meanings: cigarette, (informal) smoke, (Brit, inf) fag, (식물) tobacco, (굵기가 굵은) cigar
cigarette butt[stub], (Brit) cigarette end, (Brit, inf) fag end

vlive.korean: 우리 반에도 있나? 담배 피는 애기들? Are there smokers at my class? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 너와 내가 키스한 이유 [연애미수] EP07 재미 있는 일이 생길 때마다 너에게 말해주고 싶었
vlive.english: Are there smokers at my class?

vlive.korean: 근데 진짜 중딩들이 담배 피우고 있으면 어쩌려고 그랬어? Well, what would you do if the middle school students were smoking? 듣기 View video Dingo Story / 딩고스토리 : 남자가 사랑에 빠지는 과정_EP08 [라이크]
vlive.english: Well, what would you do if the middle school students were smoking?

vlive.korean: 놀라지 않은 게? 아니면 매번 우리 집 앞에서 담배 피우는 게? That you're not surprised? Or for smoking in front of our house all the time? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 네 옆에는 늘 내가 있을래 [연애미수] EP10
vlive.english: That you're not surprised? Or for smoking in front of our house all the time?

vlive.korean: [내가 담배 피는데 보태준 거 있어?] [It's none of your business, if I smoke or not!] View video 핵인싸 동맹 (HACKINSSA CREW) : [핵인싸 동맹] EP.36 감스트의 배그 극장 GRAND OPEN!! HACKINSSA CREW
vlive.english: [It's none of your business, if I smoke or not!]

vlive.korean: 죄송한데 담배 많이 피우셨어요? 목소리가 왜 그래요? Do you smoke a lot? What's wrong with your voice? 듣기 View video 핵인싸 동맹 (HACKINSSA CREW) : [핵인싸 동맹] EP.36 감스트의 배그 극장 GRAND OPEN!! HACKINSSA CREW
vlive.english: Do you smoke a lot? What's wrong with your voice?
